scenario_text.value:
Bah! The numbers were against me! Next time,
I won’t lose!
Just you wait...

That jerk! Spouts off some excuse and then
takes off!

You think? He still seemed pretty strong to
me. I kind of feel like he let us off easy.
Hmph! Well, I don’t like it!

So, he didn’t think us worthy of fighting in
earnest?

You mean...you think he’s actually even
stronger?

Are monsters going to keep attacking us like
that from now on?

(Ugh... I hate to think what it’d be like if
he came at us for real.)
Takuma, are you all right? You look pale.
Sorry. Guess I got lost in my own thoughts.
What kind of thoughts?

(If I say I’m worried we won’t beat Garurumon
next time, it might bring everyone down.)

(I’m sure they’re already nervous about it.
Maybe I should say I’m sure we’ll win.)
(Then again, maybe that’s irresponsible.)

(To be honest, I hope he’s someone we never
have to fight again.)
(I was thinking...)
...we might not win.
...we can take him.
...once was enough.
...we might not win.

If we have to fight Garurumon again, we might
not be able to beat him next time.
Of course we will!

But...don’t you and the others know better
than anyone he won’t go down that easy?
Well, they were pretty strong...

I could tell. It was hard for me to watch you
all in that last fight.
Don’t say that!

It’s your belief in us that makes us strong!
Doubt us, and we can’t do our best!

Labramon’s right! You should have more faith
in us.

Takuma, with Floramon and everyone else
helping, don’t you think we’ll make it?

I mean, that has been how we’ve made it
through everything so far.
Yeah, that’s true. I’m sure you’re right.

(Yet for some reason, there’s this lingering
doubt I just can’t shake...)
...we can take him.

Next time we meet Garurumon and his allies,
we can totally take them!

Don’t you think that’s a little overly
optimistic?

No...definitely not! I’m sure if we all work
together...we’ll be fine!

That’s hardly very convincing coming from
you. You slow us down more than anyone.

But you know what? I do feel more like maybe
things will work out now.
What reason do you have for saying that?

Oh, nothing specific. But hearing Takuma say
it makes me think that maybe it’s true.

Ah, yes, I can understand that. It is likely
due to Takuma’s natural charisma.

(I...wasn’t expecting anyone to say anything
like that, but I guess I can roll with it.)

I think it’s important to stay positive! At
least that’s better than getting discouraged.
Yeah, maybe.

(It’s weird, but just saying it out loud
makes me think that maybe we can do this!)
...once was enough.

One fight with Garurumon was enough. I hope
we never have to do that again.

Well, I hear what you’re saying, but we may
not have much choice.

Especially considering Garurumon’s thirst for
battle.

Yeah, and it sounded like he had some sort of
grudge against us for partnering with you.

He did seem upset about us forming bonds with
human children.

All the more reason I’d rather not fight him
again.
He’d be targeting all of you specifically.

Takuma! Don’t worry about us! Fighting to
keep you safe is what we’re here for!
Yeah, that’s right.

Please do not forget that we fight to protect
Minoru...to protect all of you.

Hear that? I feel like we really should let
them protect us.

All right. If Garurumon shows up again,
that’s what we’ll do.
But we’ll look out for all of you too!
Yeah! That’s the Takuma I know!
(It’ll work out... It has to!)
